results.title: Adventures in the Strait
results.creator_credit: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The rope that linked the dinghy to the boat had snapped. It was up to me to fix it. Sorogo’s story about an experience that showed him what he was really made of.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: This land has cared for our ancestors for generations and now it’s our turn to care for it. We need to take responsibility. This story is about Alisha’s personal connection with the land.
results.title_for_label: This is a story about the land we live on

results.title: How to innovate
results.creator_credit: Janet Isaac, Bruce Moir and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Innovations”.
One of three films for use in the process of educating teachers about the nature and benefits of innovation in the school. Contains a series of trigger items or vignettes separated by blank film to allow the projector to be stopped for discussion purposes. It is essential that these films be previewed to assess suitability for the audience and to enable preparation for discussion.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Janet Isaac, Bruce Moir and Film Australia
results.description:
Episode of Series “Innovations”.

It is essential that these films be previewed to assess suitability for the audience and to enable preparation for discussion.

results.title: What is innovation?
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Innovations”.
A three film series useful in illustrating to teachers the nature and benefits of innovations in the school. Views are expressed by educators on the concept of innovation and why some people do not innovate in the classroom.

results.title: Behind the scenes
results.creator_credit: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Why innovate?
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Innovations”.
A three film series useful in illustrating to teachers the nature and benefits of innovations in the school. Parents and teachers express views concerning education. One example shows children’s work displayed in a local pub.
